name: Nicholas McAllister
testimonial: Cameron and his team have a strong knowledge in both fitness and nutrition. I recently completed the 6 week fitness challenge, and have lost just over 8kg. IT WORKS. The accountability is key. The flexibility of remote PT sessions helps you work around your diary on an adhoc basis, which really helps as we have a young kid at home and work hours can change day to day. If you go ahead with the 6 week programme and buy into the nutrition and fitness you will get results, 100%.

name: Ian Worthington
title: GymWolfPT
testimonial: Cameron is a truly inspirational guy who I admire and respect, not just in the ‘fitness world’ - but in every aspect of life. What he and his team at TRUTH are doing is really brilliant and groundbreaking. I highly recommend Cameron, and all that he does.

name: Courtney Fumarola
testimonial: Cameron has great knowledge about all things health and fitness and how to reach your goals as a busy business owner. Cameron carried out a food intolerance test for me which has been extremely helpful in understanding my body and how it reacts to certain foods - this kind of information is invaluable and I’m extremely pleased with the service Cameron has provided.

name: Shaun Ramazannezhad
title: LLB DipPFS
testimonial: I attended an event in which Cameron gave an overview of his approach and business. The event was very insightful and it was very clear that Cameron was both passionate and knowledge about all aspects of health and fitness. He was also very easy to talk to which I believe is a very important quality when dealing with clients. If you are looking to improve your health and fitness, I would definitely recommend having a chat with Cameron!

name: Raghav Parkash
testimonial: Cameron is an absolute ASSET to have in your corner. If you are a busy leader working in a high pressured environment, you need TRUTH in your life! It may just be one of the best decisions you can ever make. Given my lifestyle with a hundred thousand things happening in any moment, it's easy to forget about the one thing that allows me to be my very best, that is my health, energy & vitality. Working with Cameron has been the very difference I have needed. In such a short period of time, Cameron was able to identify what is causing and flaring up my injuries but also what small dietary shifts I can make right now to transform my health overall in a very short period of time. I'm grateful to have the awareness I do which is having such a profound impact on my energy levels while working and my overall sharpness and effectiveness. I feel better and proud of the steps I have put in place and the conscious choices I can now make! Cameron, to you and your team, I can't thank you all enough!

name: Miranda Chadwick
testimonial: Have worked with a few trainers from Truth, all with a great positive energy. Reliable and flexible in their approach. We use them for team workouts and we always benefit immediately from the feel good factor. Recommended.

name: Ryan Burville
testimonial: Highly Recommend Truth Fitness and Cameron. Best programme I have ever signed up for and have achieved instant results. If you are considering using Truth fitness, I would not hesitate in recommending them. Worth every penny.

name: Lucas Howman
testimonial: Working with Cam and the team has been great. They've helped me achieve the rapid results i was looking for as well as building long term habits to improve my health and fitness. I can't recommend Cam's professional and caring approach more highly.

name: Chris Caffrey
testimonial: Having got to know Cameron through Linkedin, I could see straight away that he was incredible at what he does. He is engaging, smart and works so well with his clients. He has a desire to be the best, but not just for him, so that he can get the best results for his clients, which you can see he does. TRUTH are leading the way in personal fitness and health for busy CEOs, Founders and business leaders. Congratulations!

name: Martin Walsh
testimonial: I was feeling lethargic, was overweight and unfit. I was struggling to see how I could fit in exercise around work, but was a regular viewer of Cameron’s content and the success of the Truth fitness 6 week program. I reached out to Cameron and had a consultation about my goals and objectives and how the Truth team could build a program around my work and family life. I must add that he and the team did all this with an 8 hour time difference as I live and work in Singapore. The results have been phenomenal, my energy levels are up, my productivity and focus at work have improved and I lost my target weight. None of this would have been possible without Cameron and in particular Craig Simons and his encyclopaedic knowledge on fitness and nutrition combined with his infectious passion for his clients to succeed. All of this is delivered through a superb app that tracks your workouts in a user friendly way backed up by personalised communications and one to one’s with the team that gives you the guidance, expertise and encouragement to attain your goals. I cannot recommend the team at Truth more highly! Thank you Cameron and Craig and I’m already enjoying the next phase of my expert coaching from the team.

name: Hayley Spedding
testimonial: 17 weeks post full knee replacement I wasn’t sure how to make better progress beyond physio appointments and my own attempts at a gym programme. I had a partial knee replacement on the other knee 6 years ago and years of trying to keep weight down, improve muscle strength, give time to my busy career and spend time with family felt tough at times. Cam listened, truly listened, and told me he and his team could definitely make a difference. And quickly. I met Craig and with his expertise in nutrition, his planning of a bespoke gym programme and his genuine support, I haven’t looked back. 10 days in to a 6 week rapid result programme and I’m sleeping better, gym workouts are delivering real strength benefits, pain is easing, eating better and in a week I’ve lost 9lbs. My life is still busy but I now feel happier, more confident in my post op progress and healthier. I cannot wait to see what the next few weeks bring, and then beyond. It’s the best investment I’ve made in me in a long time. And I’m so pleased I’ve done it with Truth Fitness. No more excuses. Just doing it.

name: Tamara Gillan
testimonial: I wasn't sure I could fit it in, as my life is manic. I wasn't sure I could prioritise it as my son, my business, and my friends always win. But sometimes you have to prioritise yourself and health as it will help you be more everywhere else. The programme was effortlessly possible, fun and the accountability was a game changer for me. The Six Week Rapid Result System is the perfect programme for busy, stressed out business leaders like me. Thank you.
